milestone3

Class AirConditioner

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • milestone3.AirConditioner
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, ArduinoListener

    public class AirConditioner
extends Thread
implements ArduinoListener
    Class of an Air Conditioner. This is extending Thread and once its started we will update the Arduino Display and the Fans PWM.
    Author:
    sven

      • AirConditioner

        public AirConditioner(Arduino arduino,
                      double threshold)
        Constructs a new Air Conditioner. We need the connection to the Arduino and also an initial threshold.
        Parameters:
        arduino - the arduino instance to write to (serial connection)
        threshold - the initial Threshold (desired temp)

      • updateArduino

        protected void updateArduino()
        Write Information to the Arduino.

      • updateArduino

        public void updateArduino(String newValue)
        Description copied from interface: ArduinoListener
        If the Arduino has an update an read any Strings it will appear as newValue in this method. Every value is seperated by a ':' (eg. TEMP:24.30 ). Everyone how wants to listen to a specific value or sensor should implement this interface and should be registered in the Arduino as a listener.
        Specified by:
        updateArduino in interface ArduinoListener
        Parameters:
        newValue - the new read sensor value (eg.TEMP:24.30).
